Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-10977 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.14-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-10977 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.14-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 14.14-1, affected by CVE-2024-10977
